description: You find a can of soup perfectly placed in the center of a tree stump, it's half eaten and looks appealing.

choices.name: Eat it
choices.description: You ate the can of soup,it was expired! Bleah!!!

choices.name: Ignore it
choices.description: You ignored the soup, you thought about all the bugs you could find in it.

description: You're walking down a path when you hear a weird sound. It's a squirrel! He looks approachable.

choices.name: Leave it alone
choices.description: You decided to leave the squirrel alone, it kind of stank.

choices.name: Pet it
choices.description: The squirrel draws close to your hand very slowly and lets you scratch its head, the fur is soft and he looks content.

choices.name: Punch it
choices.description: You tried to punch the squirrel, but it dodged your punch and you just hit the tree very, very hard.

description: You're walking down a path in extreme darkness, it's so dark you tripped on a small rock!

choices.name: Okay
choices.description: You brush it off, but you are slightly bruised

choices.name: Scream in agony
choices.description: You scream in pain, somehow it helps?

description: On your right, as you're walking, there's an immense field that seems to keep going forever. You can see a group of 4 lying on the grass, watching the stars.

choices.name: Join them
choices.description: You walk up silently, you lay down and they accep your presence. The stars are beautiful, you actually never tried to do this, it is so worth it. You fall asleep, just to wake up to them being gone.

choices.name: Throw a rock at them
choices.description: You giggle at the idea of throwing a rock at them and you can't resist the urge to do it. You manage to hit a guy in the head, he screams in pain. The other 3 charge at you angrily. You tried to escape, since outnumbered, but they caught you. They slit your throat open with a swiss knife.

choices.name: Shout at them
choices.description: You shout, telling them how stupid they look. They angrily stare back, but nothing happens.

choices.name: Ignore them
choices.description: You decide to mind your own business, they look stupid anyway.

description: You meet a dead end, in front of you there's a rather high drop, but it seems you might be able to slide down. You could also go back and take a detour, but that would take longer.

choices.name: Slide down
choices.description: You risk it and slide down, you hit a couple of branches, but that's not so bad. You take a couple of minutes to clean yourself from the dirt.

choices.name: Take a detour
choices.description: You decide to play it safe and take a detour, you walk down a hidden path that eventually brings you back at the dead end's drop, just not at the top of it.
